name: International Congress on Engineering and Information
content: The 5th International Congress on Engineering and Information (ICEAI 2016) will take place on 10-12 May, 2016 in Osaka, Japan.The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers from academia to practitioners to share ideas, problems, and solutions. This conference will provide many opportunities for researchers to present the latest research findings and describe emerging technologies, new research problems, and directions in Engineering and Information issues. The conference seeks to contribute to presenting novel research results in all aspects of Engineering and Information. Full location details: Osaka International House Foundation 2-6 Uehommachi 8-chome, Tennoji-ku, Osaka 543-0001, Japan Tel: 06-6773-8989 Fax: 06-6773-8421 Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Submission deadline: 20 January, 2016 Notification of acceptance: 10 Feburary, 2016 Registration and final submission due: 1st March, 2016 Conference dates: 10-12 May, 2016 For more information, please visit: http://iceai.org/ or contact: info.iceai@iceai.org
